item.title: Rose Byrne and Mary Bronstein on Motherhood, Trauma and the Absurdism of ‘If I Had Legs I’d Kick You’
item.description: How bad was the worst day you’ve ever had? Expand it by five, set it in the “townie” section of Montauk at a seedy motel, tack on a host of needy therapy patients and an emotional affair, then add a c

item.title: Beyond Fest Lineup Includes ‘Good Fortune,’ ‘Dust Bunny,’ ‘The Furious’
item.description: Park Chan-wook’s ‘No Other Choice’ will open the genre fest in Los Angeles and Yorgos Lanthimos’ ‘Bugonia’ will close the Sept. 23 to Oct. 8 event.

item.title: ‘If I Had Legs I’d Kick You’ Trailer: Rose Byrne Plays a Spiraling Mother in A24 Dramedy
item.description: A24 has released the trailer for its Sundance Film Festival darling “If I Had Legs I’d Kick You.” The Rose Byrne-led dramedy from writer-director Mary Bronstein is set to hit theater
